name: fli-so
tagline: A self-hosted link shortener with analytics, redirects, and branded domains
description: fli.so is a self-hosted link-shortener tool that provides advanced redirecting options, detailed analytics, and branded domains. Targeted at small businesses and creators who want link tracking and campaign control.

features.title: URL Shortening
features.description: Create short links that redirect to longer URLs

features.title: Custom Short Links
features.description: Define custom aliases for shortened URLs

features.title: Click Tracking
features.description: Track visit counts for shortened links

features.title: Link Management
features.description: View and manage created short links

features.title: Web-Based Interface
features.description: Create and manage links through a browser UI

features.title: API Access
features.description: Programmatically create and manage short links
